review: It lasted about 4 months.  It's still under warranty, but I think I'll just replace it with something else.  I thought it would be very easy, with the voice activation, but that part only worked about 4 weeks.  It seems to have lots of different issues.  It especially hates it when I try to use Netflix.  If I do manage to get connected (after putting in my password several times) it only plays for a few minutes before kicking me off.  It doesn't care much for Pandora, either, but it's better than Netflix.
author: nikki mc mains

review: This thing is awesome! I love it! It's extremely fast too and hasn't crashed once. Video's load really fast (heck of a lot faster than Netflix).
author: CHarris

review: Bought this on sale for $69. We bought a brand new Sony Blu-ray player last month which we were using to watch amazon, but recently got a larger TV and noticed the quality of the amazon prime shows were not as good as blurays and HD cable on our new TV. We bought this hoping after reading other reviews that the picture would be better. Lucky for us, watching TV shows on this really does work better than using the an external bluray player.
author: Amazon Customer "Dr. Guber"
